d.f: `指~`農業~`現代化~、`工業~`現代化~、`國防~`現代化~`及~`科學~`技術~`現代化~。`簡稱~「`四化~」。

h.b:
ㄙˋ　˙ㄍㄜ　ㄒㄧㄢˋ　ㄉㄞˋ　ㄏㄨㄚˋ
陸⃝ㄙˋ　ㄍㄜˋ　ㄒㄧㄢˋ　ㄉㄞˋ　ㄏㄨㄚˋ

English: Deng Xiaoping's four modernizations practiced from the 1980s (possibly planned together with Zhou Enlai), namely: modernization of industry, agriculture, national defense and science and technology
